meanings.definition: Not involving the construction of buildings or other structures.
meanings.sent1: The field trip focused on nonconstruction activities like painting and gardening.
meanings.sent2: The nonconstruction materials were used for art projects instead of building.
meanings.sent3: The nonconstruction worker accidentally picked up a hammer instead of a paintbrush.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a nonconstruction zone, filled with creativity but devoid of architectural plans.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nonconstruction sparked innovative ideas for the art exhibition.

meanings.definition: The act or process of not constructing something.
meanings.sent1: The delay in the project was due to the nonconstruction of the foundation.
meanings.sent2: The city council discussed the budget allocation for nonconstruction this year.
meanings.sent3: The nonconstruction of the sandcastle left the beach empty of new creations.
meanings.sent4: His nonconstruction of relationships led to a lonely existence.
meanings.sent5: The nonconstruction of the bridge caused traffic chaos in the city.
